reference.shortdesc: The booktitlealt element contains an alternative title, subtitle, or short title for a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The booktitlealt element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows a booktitlealt element is used to provide a subtitle for the main book title:
example.codeblock: <bookmap> <booktitle> <mainbooktitle>Product Z Installation, Operation, and Maintenance Manual</mainbooktitle> <booktitlealt>Getting to know Product Z</booktitlealt> </booktitle> <!-- ... --> </bookmap>
